en.welcome:
Hi! I'm a brazilian fullstack developer full of curiousity about the world.
I Currently study computer science and data scraping at Trybe.
A few projects I've worked used the web conferencing system BigBlueButton and ASAAS API.
I'm also a Geographer as location data is one of my passions.
On the Geography scope, I've done data gathering and analysis for a ridesharing app.
I've done an essay to map info about Recife's historic center real state market.
My college essay was a case study on how to make Recife become a smart city.
I'm the founder CEO of the junior enterprise MapGeo Júnior.
